text: Ke kwabo bakholwayo benze imisebenzi elungileyo, Yena Uya kubanika umvuzo wabo oyimfanelo yabo (Abanike) ngakumbiokuvelakwiziBelezaKhe. Kebonaabobangafuniyo ukuMnqula Yena, bekhukhumele nokukhukhumala Uza kubohlwaya ngesona sohlwayo sakha sabuhlungu yaye abayi kufumana bani ngaphandle koAll√¢h oya kuba ngumkhuseli okanye umncedi
